description:
Zoro`s attempt to reunite with his friends leads him a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des nouvelles de l`équipage. Une gigantesque sépulture et la dette des sous-vêtements.
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Kyodai na Bohyou to Pantsu no On
The Friends` Whereabouts! A Huge Tomb and the Panty Debt!
Местонахождение команды! Гигантское надгробие и трусики благодарности
仲間達の行方 巨大な墓標とパンツの恩
